articles.description: Hero MotoCorp has rolled off 10 crore vehicles from its manufacturing plants, making it the first Indian company to achieve this milestone. Its 100 millionth vehicle was Xtreme 160R motorcycle
articles.content:

articles.title: Pakistan faces dilemma of sourcing Covid-19 vaccines - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Pakistan doesn’t have a well developed vaccine industry, and authorities are now grappling with the possibility of having to acquire doses at significantly higher prices
articles.content: Following Prime Minister Imran Khans directive to expedite the procurement of Covid-19 vaccines, Pakistan is grappling with a dilemma how to source millions of doses to inoculate the countrys most vu… [+3515 chars]

articles.title: CRED's Kunal Shah invests in OnePlus co-founder Carl Pei's upcoming audio startup - YourStory
articles.description: Kunal Shah has invested an undisclosed amount in Carl Pei's upcoming audio-focused startup that will be unveiled on January 27.
